category: Regulations on establishment and operation of advisory committee/Article 13 (School Sports Committee)
contents: Article 13 (School Sports Committee) The School Sports Committee responds to the presidentâ€™s advice on the following matters. Revised 2018. 7. 9., 2019. 1. 31., 2023. 7. 5. 1. Matters pertaining to the promotion of school sports 2. Matters pertaining to school sports promotion research, presentations of physical education research papers and holding classes 3. School Matters pertaining to sports facilities 4. Matters pertaining to school sports events 5. Matters pertaining to recommendations for school sports meritorious awards 6. Matters pertaining to revitalization of youth sports activities 7. Matters pertaining to the operation of city/provincial school sports committees 8. Activation of school sports clubs 9. Other matters recognized as being in accordance with the functions of the School Sports Committee and submitted by the president
